name: Epic 1: Project Foundation & Design System
description: Scaffolding, tooling, Convex setup, design tokens, and reusable UI components. Everything else depends on this.

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and tooling
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a properly configured Next.js project with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and pnpm so the team has a consistent development environment.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14+ app router project initialized with TypeScript strict mode
ESLint configured with Next.js recommended rules
pnpm typecheck, pnpm lint, and pnpm build all pass

userStories.title: Set up Convex backend
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Convex.dev configured as the backend so we have real-time data, serverless functions, and file storage from the start.
acceptanceCriteria: Convex installed and configured with the Next.js project
convex/ directory initialized with schema file
Convex dev server runs alongside Next.js dev server
Environment variables for Convex deployment URL configured

userStories.title: Implement design system tokens
userStories.description: As a developer, I need all design tokens from handoff-design-system.md implemented as CSS custom properties and/or Tailwind config so every component uses consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: All color tokens implemented (--primary, --secondary, --accent, --vault, backgrounds, text, borders, semantic)
Typography: Google Fonts loaded (Instrument Serif, Bricolage Grotesque, Caveat), font-family tokens set
Type scale tokens (--text-xs through --text-6xl), line-height, and letter-spacing tokens
Linen background with subtle noise texture on body
Verify in browser: tokens render correctly at 375px and 768px
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Reference handoff-design-system.md for all token values

userStories.title: Build core UI components — Buttons
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable Button components matching the design system so all actions are visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Variants: primary (terracotta), secondary (sage), vault (slate), ghost, soft, danger
Hover: translateY(-1px) + shadow elevation + darker background
Primary casts colored shadow matching its background
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build core UI components — Inputs & Search Bar
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable Input, Textarea, and SearchBar components matching the design system.
acceptanceCriteria: Text input with label, hint text, and error state support
Focus: border changes to --primary, focus ring --primary-subtle
Error: border --danger, hint text turns red
SearchBar: icon inside left padding, sunken default bg, raised bg on focus
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build core UI components — Badges & Pills
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable Badge components for status indicators, room tags, time slots, and trip overlay markers.
acceptanceCriteria: Variants: overlay (amber, star prefix), room (neutral), vault (slate, lock prefix), success, warning, danger, time
All badges: 12px font, 600 weight, pill radius, consistent padding
Room badges accept dynamic room name text
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Location Card component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the signature Location Card component — the polaroid-style photo card with handwritten caption that is Handoff's visual identity.
acceptanceCriteria: Card structure: photo (4:3 aspect ratio) + Caveat-font caption + room badge
Supports tilt variants: tilted-left (-1.5deg), neutral (0deg), tilted-right (+1.2deg)
Tappable — expands to full-screen photo/video on click
Placeholder state when no image uploaded
280px default width, responsive in grid contexts
Verify in browser: visual matches design system polaroid spec
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Signature UX element — must match design system exactly

userStories.title: Build Pet Profile Card component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Pet Profile Card component — the emotional core of the product — displaying the pet's photo as hero with structured details below.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero photo: 1:1 aspect ratio, full bleed, object-fit: cover
Detail rows with emoji icons: feeding, medications, walking, vet (tap-to-call in sage)
Personality note in Caveat font on --accent-subtle background
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Task Item component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Task Item component with interactive check-off, proof button, and overlay badge support.
acceptanceCriteria: Structure: checkbox + body (text + meta badges) + optional proof button
Check animation: fills --secondary, white checkmark SVG, spring bounce (checkPop keyframe)
Completed state: --secondary-subtle bg, text strikethrough in muted
Overlay state: 3px left border in --accent, overlay badge in meta
Proof button: dashed border, camera icon, hover turns terracotta
Time badge and room badge in meta row
Verify in browser: spring animation feels satisfying
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Vault Item component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Vault Item component with revealed, locked, and hidden states.
acceptanceCriteria: Structure: icon + label/hint + value or verify button
Revealed state: --secondary-subtle bg, code visible in monospace, letter-spacing: 0.15em
Locked state (unverified): fully hidden, message 'verify your phone number to view' + verify button
No blurred/teased state for unregistered viewers
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Emergency Contact Bar component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a horizontally scrollable emergency contact bar for quick tap-to-call access.
acceptanceCriteria: Per contact: 36px round icon (color-coded by role) + name + role + 'Call' link
Icon colors: owner (--primary-light), vet (--secondary-light), neighbor (--accent-light), emergency (--danger-light)
tel: href for tap-to-call on mobile
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Today View Header component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Today View header that sets context for the sitter — greeting, date, and task summary stats.
acceptanceCriteria: Greeting: Instrument Serif, text-3xl, white, uses sitter name
Date line: text-sm, 80% opacity, shows day X of Y
Summary stats: glassmorphism chips (tasks today, completed, proof needed)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Wizard Progress Indicator component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a 6-step wizard progress indicator for the guided setup flow.
acceptanceCriteria: 6 steps: Home, Pets, Access, Contacts, Instructions, Review
Completed: sage dot with checkmark, sage label
Active: terracotta dot with number, terracotta label, colored shadow
Upcoming: border-outlined dot, muted number and label
Connector lines between steps: sage when completed, --border otherwise
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Section Navigation component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need horizontal scrollable pills for navigating manual sections in the sitter view.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Notification Toast component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need toast notification components for owner-facing event alerts.
acceptanceCriteria: Variants: success (sage left border), vault (slate left border), warning (amber left border)
Entrance animation: slide from right with spring easing, 0.5s
Auto-dismiss after 5 seconds with manual close option
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Bottom Navigation component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the 4-tab mobile bottom navigation for the sitter view.
acceptanceCriteria: Fixed to bottom of viewport on mobile
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Time Slot Divider component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need time slot dividers to separate morning/afternoon/evening task groups in the Today View.
acceptanceCriteria: Variants: morning (sun emoji, --accent-light), afternoon (cloud-sun emoji, --primary-light), evening (moon emoji, --vault-light)
32px round icon + uppercase label + horizontal line filling remaining width
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build Activity Feed Item component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need activity feed item components for the owner's chronological log.
acceptanceCriteria: Color-coded 8px dots: view (terracotta), task (sage), vault (slate), proof (amber)
Text with bold name, text-sm, timestamp in text-xs muted
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Configure PWA manifest and service worker
userStories.description: As a developer, I need PWA configuration so the app is installable and supports offline access.
acceptanceCriteria: manifest.json with app name 'Handoff', theme color #C2704A, background #FAF6F1
Service worker registered with basic caching strategy
'Add to Home Screen' prompt works on iOS and Android
Verify: app loads offline after first visit (basic shell)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Set up responsive layout shell
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the responsive app layout shell with creator dashboard layout and sitter view layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Creator layout: sidebar nav (desktop), bottom nav (mobile), main content area
Sitter layout: full-width mobile-first, bottom navigation, today view as default
Max content width constrained appropriately per view
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
